verbose_text: To examine the utility of our platelet targeted approach using ultrasound, both scFv GPIIb / IIIa and scFv mut were biotinylated in order to enable direct conjugation with streptavidin coated microbubbles (MBs) to obtain scFv GPIIb / IIIa -MBs and scFv mut -MBs respectively XREF_BIBR.
evidence: mut  were biotinylated in order to enable direct conjugation with streptavidin-coated microbubbles (MBs) to obtain scFv GPIIb/IIIa -MBs
